item.title: California fires live updates: LA area faces 'particularly dangerous situation'
item.description: At least 24 people are believed to be dead and more than a dozen others remain unaccounted for as multiple wildfires rage across Southern California.

item.title: NATO allies unsettled by alleged Russian Baltic Sea sabotage scramble to respond
item.description: A spate of alleged sabotage operations against undersea cables in the Baltic Sea has raised the prospect of a dangerous 2025 in NATO's northern theate...

item.title: Bezos' space firm calls off debut launch of new rocket in final minutes of countdown
item.description: Blue Origin has called off the debut launch of its massive new rocket because of technical trouble

item.title: Dazzling Ice Castles draw tourists to New Hampshire, other states
item.description: An annual architectural celebration of ice is up and running again in New Hampshire and several other states

item.title: Man says two of his cats died after drinking raw milk recalled for bird flu
item.description: A California man says his two cats died and a third was hospitalized after he fed them raw milk recalled for bird flu risk
